txt.en: Many elements of the UI can be customized including where panels appears on-screen and which buttons appear on the left side of your toolbar. To reposition panels, Press CTRL-Backslash to toggle the UI lock and position panels to wherever you like. Press CTRL-Backslash again to re-lock your UI. To customize your toolbar buttons, press the small button near your Auto-Attack button (Customize Toolbar Slots) or open your Options UI Settings to the Toolbar Slots section. From there you can set which buttons appear where on your toolbar.
Many elements of the UI can be customized. Press CTRL-Backslash to toggle the UI lock, so you can reposition panels to wherever you like. Press CTRL-Backslash again to re-lock your UI.
